job_tasks.phrase: work on two of our most important tracks: Development of a data science platform that other teams can use
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of the company's strategic priorities and how the platform development aligns with them, by enabling other teams.

job_tasks.phrase: Development of a data science platform
job_tasks.justification: Building a platform for data science implies the creation and maintenance of data infrastructure and pipelines that data scientists will utilize.

job_tasks.phrase: Development of a data science platform
job_tasks.justification: Developing a platform involves software engineering practices to build and maintain a functional system.

job_tasks.phrase: Supporting our data scientists in the development of AI use cases & Experiments
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to assisting in the creation and refinement of AI models, which falls under the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Supporting our data scientists in the development of AI use cases & Experiments
job_tasks.justification: While focused on supporting data scientists, this often involves engineering support for their experiments and the integration of their use cases into broader systems.

soft_skills.phrase: You have daily contact with the rest of the team and you like to work in an interdisciplinary environment. We really bring the worlds of Engineering and Data Science together.
Supporting our data scientists in the development of AI use cases & Experiments

classification.rationale: The role is described as a 'Cloud/Data Engineer' with a focus on supporting data scientists and developing a data science platform. While it involves AI use cases, there's no explicit mention of core GenAI tasks like prompt engineering, RAG, or fine-tuning LLMs, nor is there a strong emphasis on building production-grade GenAI applications. The primary focus seems to be on infrastructure and support for traditional data science workflows.
